message: Starting my Masters in Data Science at NYU!

Built Metroscore, a Python package which helps transit planners determine where, when, and how transit in their city can be improved.
Package
Completed my senior capstone project into kernel machines and how they can help us understand neural network behavior. See the poster and article here.
Did some research into redlining and quantifying its impact on various American Cities. Read the paper here.

Started as President of the Data Science Student Society at UCSD. We have ~300 active members, and I help put organize around 30 events each quarter to help students learn various skills within data science.
Second internship at AWS Sagemaker, this time in Seattle. Built a brand-new, highly requested feature that involved redbuilding the guts of the system.

Interned at AWS Sagemaker in New York. Built a series of time series analysis features into SageMaker Data Wrangler.
Press Release

Did some ML research for talking dogs. Specifically, I built a computer vision anomaly detection system to detect relevant research video in over 2TB of research footage.
Check out the New York Times article on the project!
Founded the British Parliamentary debate team at UCSD, and coached the 30+ members on the team until 2022.

Wrote a Python package to help time series analysts detect price shocks in time series data.
Package
Paper
